CustomField.description: Created as a part of SFS-4803
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Vegetation can affect the structural stability of the pipe bridge. It can also make visual assessment of the pipe bridge difficult.
CustomField.label: Vegetation Measuring

value.fullName: There is no vegetation on the pipe bridge
value.label: There is no vegetation on the pipe bridge

value.fullName: Pipe bridge has small amounts of vegetation nearby but not affecting structure
value.label: Pipe bridge has small amounts of vegetation nearby but not affecting structure

value.fullName: Vegetation makes visual inspection of pipe bridge difficult
value.label: Vegetation makes visual inspection of pipe bridge difficult

value.fullName: Pipe bridge requires vegetation clearance in the next 3-6 months
value.label: Pipe bridge requires vegetation clearance in the next 3-6 months

value.fullName: Pipe bridge with heavily vegetation causing structural overloading or trees affecting structure
value.label: Pipe bridge with heavily vegetation causing structural overloading or trees affecting structure
